alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion; Newton; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 7:42PM CDT until May 14 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Southern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valley Springs, or near Harrison, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Harrison... Western Grove... Valley Springs... Dugger... Olvey... Capps... Piercetown... Carver... Pruitt... Crawford... Bellefonte... Everton... St. Joe... Pindall... Marble Falls... Yardelle... Vendor... Gaither... Hasty... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
